name: Sweet Candied Orange and Lemon Peel
author: Brenda Ward
summary: With this easy-to-follow recipe, orange and lemon peel become an elegant--yet still a bit tart--sugared confection.
ingredients: 6  lemon peels, cut into 1/4 inch strips
4  orange peels, cut into 1/4 inch strips
⅓ cup white sugar for decoration
directions: Place lemon and orange peel in large saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil over high heat
Boil for 20 minutes, drain and set aside
In medium saucepan, combine 2 cups sugar and 1 cup water
Bring to a boil and cook until mixture reaches thread stage, 230 degrees F (108 degrees C) on candy thermometer, or small amount dropped in cold water forms a soft thread
Stir in peel, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirring frequently
Roll peel pieces, a few at a time, in remaining sugar
Let dry on wire rack several hours
